Description: Managing Trustee, Ashoka Group of Schools, Nashik · I strongly believe that Education is not the 'Answer to the Question', but it is the journey of self-exploration of the child where he discovers himself and sees how in this journey he unfolds his questions and finds his own answers. Purpose of education is to create lifelong ‘Learners and Thinkers.’ Literate are the ones who can think creatively and critically, those who are open to Learn, Unlearn and Relearn.<br><br>As the Managing Trustee of Ashoka Group of Schools, I try to offer learners the opportunities to innovate, incubate, accelerate and actuate their own projects while still promoting their entrepreneurial and leadership growth thus allowing them to develop the skills they will need to thrive in their future. <br>With an aim to create a conducive environment for a child to explore and identify his passion I have been working as an Edupreneur to craft a niche in educational services that will help educators and studen
